text:
Members of the BMC community came together to share why they decided to get the #COVID19 #vaccine. Who are you getting vaccinated 💉 for? Let us know by using the hashtag #BMCProud! #trustthefacts #getthevax

For more information on the vaccine, visit https://t.co/yDfAGyaumJ https://t.co/EqNG7Yvj04
